DateTime::Locale::it_CH(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DateTime::Locale::it_CH(3)

NAME

DateTime::Locale::it_CH - Locale data examples for the Italian Switzerland (it-CH) locale

DESCRIPTION

This pod file contains examples of the locale data available for the Italian Switzerland locale.

Days

Wide (format) 

  lunedì
  martedì
  mercoledì
  giovedì
  venerdì
  sabato
  domenica

Abbreviated (format)

  lun
  mar
  mer
  gio
  ven
  sab
  dom

Narrow (format)

  L
  M
  M
  G
  V
  S
  D

Wide (stand-alone)

  lunedì
  martedì
  mercoledì
  giovedì
  venerdì
  sabato
  domenica

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  lun
  mar
  mer
  gio
  ven
  sab
  dom

Narrow (stand-alone)

  L
  M
  M
  G
  V
  S
  D

Months

Wide (format) 

  gennaio
  febbraio
  marzo
  aprile
  maggio
  giugno
  luglio
  agosto
  settembre
  ottobre
  novembre
  dicembre

Abbreviated (format)

  gen
  feb
  mar
  apr
  mag
  giu
  lug
  ago
  set
  ott
  nov
  dic

Narrow (format)

  G
  F
  M
  A
  M
  G
  L
  A
  S
  O
  N
  D

Wide (stand-alone)

  gennaio
  febbraio
  marzo
  aprile
  maggio
  giugno
  luglio
  agosto
  settembre
  ottobre
  novembre
  dicembre

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  gen
  feb
  mar
  apr
  mag
  giu
  lug
  ago
  set
  ott
  nov
  dic

Narrow (stand-alone)

  G
  F
  M
  A
  M
  G
  L
  A
  S
  O
  N
  D

Quarters

Wide (format) 

  1º trimestre
  2º trimestre
  3º trimestre
  4º trimestre

Abbreviated (format)

  T1
  T2
  T3
  T4

Narrow (format)

  1
  2
  3
  4

Wide (stand-alone)

  1º trimestre
  2º trimestre
  3º trimestre
  4º trimestre

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  T1
  T2
  T3
  T4

Narrow (stand-alone)

  1
  2
  3
  4

Eras

Wide (format) 

  avanti Cristo
  dopo Cristo

Abbreviated (format)

  a.C.
  d.C.

Narrow (format)

  aC
  dC

Date Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = martedì, 5 febbraio 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = venerdì, 22 dicembre 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sabato, 15 settembre -10

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 febbraio 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 dicembre 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 settembre -10

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 feb 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 dic 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 set -10

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 05.02.08
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22.12.95
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15.09.-10

Time Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 UTC

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 UTC

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44

Datetime Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = martedì, 5 febbraio 2008 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = venerdì, 22 dicembre 1995 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sabato, 15 settembre -10 04:44:23 UTC

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 febbraio 2008 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 dicembre 1995 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 settembre -10 04:44:23 UTC

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 feb 2008, 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 dic 1995, 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 set -10, 04:44:23

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 05.02.08, 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22.12.95, 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15.09.-10, 04:44

Available Formats

Bh (h B) 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4 B

Bhm (h:mm B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 B

Bhms (h:mm:ss B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 B

E (ccc)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab

EBhm (E h:mm B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 6:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 9:05 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 4:44 B

EBhms (E h:mm:ss B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 6:30:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 9:05:02 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 4:44:23 B

EHm (E HH:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 04:44

EHms (E HH:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 04:44:23

Ed (E d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 15

Ehm (E h:mm a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 4:44 AM

Ehms (E h:mm:ss a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 4:44:23 AM

Gy (y G)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 d.C.
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 d.C.
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 a.C.

GyMMM (MMM y G)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = feb 2008 d.C.
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = dic 1995 d.C.
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = set -10 a.C.

GyMMMEd (E d MMM y G)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 5 feb 2008 d.C.
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 22 dic 1995 d.C.
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 15 set -10 a.C.

GyMMMd (d MMM y G)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 feb 2008 d.C.
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 dic 1995 d.C.
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 set -10 a.C.

H (HH)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04

Hm (HH:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44

Hms (HH:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

Hmsv (HH:mm:ss v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 UTC

Hmv (HH:mm v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44 UTC

M (L)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9

MEd (E d/M)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 5/2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 22/12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 15/9

MMM (LLL)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = feb
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = dic
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = set

MMMEd (E d MMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 5 feb
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 22 dic
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 15 set

MMMMW-count-one ('settimana' W 'di' MMMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = settimana 1 di febbraio
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = settimana 3 di dicembre
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = settimana 2 di settembre

MMMMW-count-other ('settimana' W 'di' MMMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = settimana 1 di febbraio
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = settimana 3 di dicembre
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = settimana 2 di settembre

MMMMd (d MMMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 febbraio
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 dicembre
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 settembre

MMMd (d MMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 feb
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 dic
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 set

Md (d/M)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5/2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22/12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15/9

d (d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15

h (h a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4 AM

hm (h:mm a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 AM

hms (h:mm:ss a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM

hmsv (h:mm:ss a v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM UTC

hmv (h:mm a v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 AM UTC

ms (mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 44:23

y (y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10

yM (M/y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9/-10

yMEd (E d/M/y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 5/2/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 22/12/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 15/9/-10

yMMM (MMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = feb 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = dic 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = set -10

yMMMEd (E d MMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = mar 5 feb 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ven 22 dic 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = sab 15 set -10

yMMMM (MMMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = febbraio 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = dicembre 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = settembre -10

yMMMd (d MMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 feb 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 dic 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 set -10

yMd (d/M/y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5/2/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22/12/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15/9/-10

yQQQ (QQQ y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = T1 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = T4 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = T3 -10

yQQQQ (QQQQ y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 1º trimestre 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 4º trimestre 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 3º trimestre -10

yw-count-one ('settimana' w 'del' Y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = settimana 6 del 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = settimana 51 del 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = settimana 37 del -10

yw-count-other ('settimana' w 'del' Y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = settimana 6 del 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = settimana 51 del 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = settimana 37 del -10

Miscellaneous

Prefers 24 hour time?

Yes

Local first day of the week

1 (lunedì)

SUPPORT

See DateTime::Locale.
